content: विकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To doubt, be doubtful; <ls>Pt. 1. 339.</ls> {@--2@} To be optional. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To doubt, question. {@--2@} To consider, reflect upon; सखीनियोगोऽपि विकल्प्यते <ls>Ś. 3.</ls> {@--3@} To presume, conjecture. {@--4@} To prepare or arrange differently. {@--5@} To make, form. {@--6@} To exchange. {@--7@} To admit as optional.
